content.project_title: Development and Assessment of Seismic Performance of Affordable Earthquake Resistant Interlocking Block for Earthen Masonry Houses
content.funding_agency: SERB-DST, Govt. of India, under the Core Research Grant (CRG) Scheme
content.essential_qualifications: Post Graduate Degree in relevant Professional Course (Civil Engineering, Construction Engineering, Civil & Environmental Engineering, Applied Mechanics, Material Science & Engineering, and allied disciplines), selected through CSIR-UGC NET including Lectureship, GATE, or national-level examinations by Central Govt. Departments/Agencies (DST, DBT, DAE, DOS, DRDO, MoE, MHRD, ICAR, ICMR, IIT, IISc, IISER, etc.)
responsibilities: Carry out research on seismic performance of affordable earthquake-resistant interlocking blocks
Maintain records of results (soft and hard copy)
Carry out any other departmental work as directed by PI

Project duration is 3 years; position co-terminus with project
No TA/DA for interview or joining

Appointment temporary as per Institute terms
Only shortlisted candidates informed via email; engagement letter sent upon selection
Applicant responsible for authenticity of information and documents
